/** @format */export var CVDesc=['French native, Yannick received his formal culinary training in a renouned Michelin star restaurant in Lille at the age of 16; apprentice in Pastry, Yannick has developed a profound culinary knowledge in the kitchen and pastry division, before his first chef de cuisine position at Regal Kowloon in Hong Kong at the age of 27.','Chef Yannick brings over 30 years experience, with exposure working in Europe, Asia and Middle East. That allows chef Yannick to develop extensive knowledge in Asian and International cuisine, yet Classical, Modern and with a Gourmet flair.','Currently based as "in house chef" at Morgan Stanley Hong Kong since 2008 up to April 2022, chef Yannick works as Executive Chef managing his team in a corporate environment, including various nature of events for example business lunches, summits, conferences for both internal and external events covering the whole APAC region.'];export var CVApproach=['Client first, understand the objectives, core values and vision of the company.','Adhere to & follow the principle of think, do, measure, correct & improve continuously.','Result-oriented, adopt actions to circumstances to obtain the best possible results.','Create a dynamic structure in the kitchen, fresh seasonal products, quality processes & resources.','Hands-on, coaching & leading a team meticulously to bring out team members best skills / team building / training and managing budgets and targets.'];export var CVFuture=['Preferably based in Hong Kong or the APAC region overseeing sites in a wellbeing working environment such as Corporate, Hospitality, Sports & Leisure sites.','Base lines objectives and expectations of offering first class meals with the ambition to scientific approach to creating food with nutritional values and customers needs.'];export var ExpItems=[{title:'Executive Chef',loc:'MORGAN STANLEY, Corporate Facilities & Services - With a meeting room accommodating up to 70 customers, And the restaurant serves 80 to 90 covers daily, offering an a la Carte and Seasonal Gourmet Menu."},{title:'Commis Chef & Pastry Trainee',loc:'Restaurant “Le Crabe Tambour” Cambrai, FRANCE',period:'July 1989 - Jun. 1992 (3 years)',img:'huitriere-lille.jpg',link:'https://lille.guide-ville.com/en/lhuitriere-restaurant-fish-oyster-bar-2/'}];export var SupplierList=[{title:'HK Hydroponics',subtitle:"HK Hydroponics's farm in Liufushan produces thousands of hydroponic vegetables and fruits a day, enough to supply 10% of the local market. Our products are fresh, healthy and pollution-free, and have been welcomed by major companies and institutions for many years. Our wholesale customers include Hong Kong International Airport, Morgan Stanley, airlines and restaurant chains.",logo:'hydrophonics.png',link:'https://www.hk-hydroponics.com/'},{title:'Mottainai Lamb',subtitle:"Sustainably produced marbled lamb meat that is a source of Omega-3 with Increased Oleic Fatty Acids... 80% of the food fed to our lambs is recycled organics that would otherwise go to landfill. Carrot pomace (by-product from juicing), unsaleable carrots, green carrot leaf and sedimentary olive oil is carefully collected and scientifically blended with cereals, vitamins and minerals for a nutritionally balanced diet.",logo:'mottainai.png',link:'https://www.mottainailamb.com/our-story/'},{title:'Neal’s Yard Dairy',subtitle:"The Specialist Cheesemakers Association (SCA) is the industry body that represents artisan and farmhouse cheesemakers in the UK. Industry organisations that Neal’s Yard Dairy is a member of which have interesting resources available online include the Raw Milk Producers Association, the American Cheese Society, and Oldways Cheese Coalition. Of course this is not an exhaustive list, but I’d also suggest visiting the Sustainable Food Trust, Pasture for Life, the Agriculture Horticulture Development Board,the Ecological Land Cooperative, The Landworkers Alliance and Land in Our Names and Cotswold Seeds is good for info on herbal leys.",logo:'nealsyarddair.png',link:'https://www.nealsyarddairy.co.uk/pages/discover'},{title:'Rhug Estate',subtitle:"I Firmly Believe In Sustainable Farming And Employing The Highest Standard Of Animal Welfare. By Not Using Sprays, Artificial Fertiliser And Routine Medication You End Up With A More Healthy, Tender, And Tasty Meat. All Of The Livestock Enjoy A 100% Organic Diet And Live Free-Range On Clover Rich Pasture. – Lord Newborough, Founder",logo:'rhug.png',link:'https://rhug.co.uk/our-sustainability'},{title:'Green Monday',subtitle:"Awareness of the impact the livestock industry has created in terms of greenhouse gas emission, water footprint and food production inefficiency as well as our health on an individual level has reached new heights. Green Common is the world’s first plant-based concept store to create a revolutionary food and lifestyle experience by introducing some of the most pioneering global foodtech innovations.",logo:'greenmonday.png',link:'https://greenmonday.org/en/'},{title:'M&C Asia',subtitle:"We provide an extended selection of premium seafood that have been sourced responsibly. We work directly with small fishermen and follow a sustainable scheme by supporting artisanal fishing, guaranteeing traceability and prioritising seasonality.",logo:'mnc.png',link:'https://www.mnc-asia.com/'}];export var SustainableImages=['green.png','pink.png','lobsters.jpeg','japanese.jpeg','meal01.jpeg','meal02.png','e11.png','rugh02.png','e12.png'];export var HealthList=[{title:"Fresh+",subtitle:"Healthy weekly meal plans",img:["fresh01.png"]},{title:"Traffic Light",subtitle:"Nutrition guide",img:["traffic00.png","traffic01.png"]},{title:"Rice and Superfoods",subtitle:"",img:["rice02.png","rice04.png","rice03.png","rice01.png"]},{title:"Nutrition Facts",subtitle:"Measure calorie count of food & beverages produced on site",img:["nutri01.jpeg"]},{title:"Recipe Book",subtitle:"10 minutes healthy recipe dishes that can be done at home",img:[""]},{title:"Consultation",subtitle:"1 on 1 client consultations giving individual advise about food choice and health diet",img:["consult.jpeg"]},{title:"Return to Work Back in Shape",subtitle:"a weekly healthy, well balance menu promoting superfood treats after the festive holiday",img:["work01.png","work02.png"]}];export var EventsList=['e01.png','e02.png','e03.png','e04.png','e05.png','e06.png','e07.png','e10.png','e08.png'];// healthy, pastry, promotion theme,
